description:
Who knew having comfortable insoles could help save the world. These performance thick cork insoles are made of recycled wine corks from ReCORK, a natural and renewable material that reduces waste and carbon footprint.

  • The insoles are also coated with Polygiene, a recycled silver salt that prevents odour-causing bacteria from growing
  • The insoles feature a thick cushioning that absorbs shock and reduces stress on your joints
  • They also have a built-in metatarsal pad that supports the natural spread of your forefoot bones and relieves pressure and pain
  • The insoles have a zero-drop design, a deep heel cup, and a dynamic arch support that promote neutral alignment and balance
  • The insoles are heat and wear moldable, meaning they can adapt to the shape of your feet and shoes for a custom fit
name: Sole Performance Thick Cork Footbeds - Unisex
